name: GKGraphNode
desc: A single node in a navigation graph for use in pathfinding.

items.name: var connectedNodes: [GKGraphNode]
items.desc: The list of other nodes connected to this node.

items.name: func addConnections(to: [GKGraphNode], bidirectional: Bool)
items.desc: Connects this node to all nodes in the specified list.

items.name: func removeConnections(to: [GKGraphNode], bidirectional: Bool)
items.desc: Removes the connections from this node to the specified nodes.

items.name: func cost(to: GKGraphNode) -> Float
items.desc: Returns the cost to travel from this node to the specified, directly connected, node.

items.name: func estimatedCost(to: GKGraphNode) -> Float
items.desc: Returns an underestimate of the cost of travel from this node to the specified node.

items.name: func findPath(to: GKGraphNode) -> [GKGraphNode]
items.desc: Computes and returns a sequence of nodes that represents the lowest-cost graph traversal from this node to the specified node.

items.name: func findPath(from: GKGraphNode) -> [GKGraphNode]
items.desc: Computes and returns a sequence of nodes that represents the lowest-cost graph traversal from the specified node to this node.
